hadiths.text: Aishah narrated:"When Allah's Messenger (S) prayed the two Rak'ah (before) Fajr if he needed something from me he would talk to me, if not, he would go to Salat

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْكَلاَمِ بَعْدَ رَكْعَتَىِ الْفَجْرِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Talking After The Two Rak'ah (Before) Fajr
